A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: How do these filmmakers not only crap on the Lucas movies but also crap on their own new trilogy?  I greatly dislike Force Awakens and loathe this film but come on\, how can you not even keep things straight within your own context? All the things they built up: Luke's lightsaber\, who is Snoke\, Rey's parentage. All thrown away. I loved the Lucas films. Say what you will\, at least those films had a thread going through them\, a sense consistency. These new ones\, it seems the directors are too busy shitting on each other.
